title: Ride On Sweeper DRS-90T
description: The DRS-90T Ride On Sweeper is an all-in-one cleaning unit designed for use in industrial, commercial, or outdoor spaces. As a ride On Sweeper, it is comfortable to use and performs well while being easy to control. The DRS-90T features modern filtration and dust collection systems, which make it easy to operate. Its ability to remove dirt, dust, and debris with ease allows the DRS-90T to clean parking lots, warehouses, and factory floors.
keyFeatures: Enhanced Efficiency: The unit’s strong suction power and wide sweeping path allow it to clear large spaces in short periods of time.
Optimal Dust Control: Clean air and minimal dust return are ensured thanks to the multi-stage filtration system with a powerful vacuum and filter shaker.
Easy Maintenance: Brush replacement does not require tools, and important components are easy to access, reducing service costs.
Increased Operating Time: The DRS-90T can be fitted with a battery system in addition to a fuel-efficient engine, providing extended runtime ideal for long shifts.
Simple Design: The ergonomic user cabin design ensures perfect seating posture and comfort, with clear controls and excellent visibility for fatigue-free operation.
Sturdy Construction: The unit is perfect for tough working environments, with impact-resistant body panels and a durable steel frame.
